mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_board_id AS qnaBoardId, q.user_id AS userId, q.title AS title, q.content AS content, q.answer AS answer, q.created_date AS createdDate, q.updated_date AS updatedDate, q.answered_date AS answeredDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email FROM QnABoard q JOIN User u ON q.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY q.qna_board_id DESC

SELECT q.qna_board_id AS qnaBoardId, q.user_id AS userId, q.title AS title, q.content AS content, q.answer AS answer, q.created_date AS createdDate, q.updated_date AS updatedDate, q.answered_date AS answeredDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email FROM QnABoard q JOIN User u ON q.user_id = u.user_id WHERE q.qna_board_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.update: UPDATE QnABoard SET answer = #{answer}, answered_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE qna_board_id = #{qnaId}
